title: Minus Ondo no Serenade
original_name: マイナス温度のセレナーデ
sinopse:
Shouta Tanaka's father recently remarried, and to take advantage of their honeymoon, he leaves his son in the hands of his new wife's daughter, Kaoru. Then begins a new cohabitation between the young Shouta and the impassive Kaoru whom he particularly likes.

(Source: MU)
